title: Bowl, ca. 1856
markings: Marks: Stamped on silver handle with Netherlandish hall marks [See Notes].
description: Oval bowl with wide flared lip scalloped at edge; cut with star on bottom, row of printies around base; tall silver loop handle, lobed and engraved with floral motifs, ornate mounts at joining to bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1856.
ca. 1856. glass, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-80.
